**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 84 4.0 **Requirements** You aren’t [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) or raging. --- You tap into your inner fury and begin raging. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier. This frenzy lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies you can perceive, or until you fall [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38), whichever comes first. You can't voluntarily stop raging. While you are raging:
  • You deal 2 additional damage with melee Strikes. This additional damage is halved if your weapon or unarmed attack is agile.
  • You take a –1 penalty to AC.
  • You can't use actions with the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait unless they also have the [rage](/Traits.aspx?ID=135) trait. You can [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) while raging.
After you stop raging, you lose any remaining temporary Hit Points from Rage, and you can't Rage again for 1 minute.
